title: Handle Rule Change Implementation
description: A league has approved a new rule for the upcoming season. An administrator must ensure all officials and teams are aware of the change.

tasks.description: Update the official league rulebook with the new rule.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully updates the digital rulebook.

tasks.description: Create a training module for referees explaining the new rule and how to enforce it.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates a video and text-based training module.

tasks.description: Send a formal memorandum to all teams and registered officials detailing the rule change.
